goToSettingsDescription: Biometric authentication is not set up on your device. Go to 'Settings > Security' to add biometric authentication.
welcomeToSystemAlarmSubtitle:
Make managing the accused easier 
with alerts and scheduled appointments.
manageCriminalsSubtitle: A complete system for tracking extended detention dates and managing accused data with accuracy and security.
saveYourTimeSubtitle: You will get effective tools to save your precious time. You can efficiently manage suspect data, the app reminds you of important appointments through smart alerts, ensuring you don't miss out.
onboardingNotificationsSubtitle: You can control the timing of notifications, such as stopping the first, second, or third notification as needed.
autoBackupsSubtitle: Auto backups allow you to save your data to Google Drive on scheduled intervals without the need for any action from you.
cannot_change_username_with_google: When signing in with a Google account, you cannot change your username
lengthEmail: Email must be at least 6 characters
lengthPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
lengthUsername: Username must be at least 6 characters
forgotPasswordDescription:
Don't worry! It happens. Please enter 
your email address associated with your account
notEditAnyData: You will not modify any data
deleteMyAccountDescription:
You will lose your data by
 deleting your account. This action
 cannot be undone.
conformDeleteMyAccountDescription:
Please enter your password to confirm the deletion of your account. Please ensure this action, as all data
 will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
unsupportedDevice: No biometric authentication method has been activated or the device does not support it
noBiometricActivated: No biometric authentication method is activated
doYouWantActivateBiometric: Do you want to activate biometric authentication in the application?
chooseAuthMethodRefer: Choose the authentication method you prefer
letStartSettingBackup: Let's start setting up the backup to
automaticBackupDescription: Automatic backup will save your data to Google Drive at scheduled intervals without the need for any action from you.
manualBackupDescription: Manual backup allows you to save your data to Google Drive whenever you want, providing more control over the process.
welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Pretrial Detention Extension Appointment Program. This program is characterized by accuracy, ease, and security.

features.alert1: • Alerts one week after adding the accused, known as the first alert.
features.alert2: • An alert after forty-five days from the first alert, known as the second alert.
features.alert3: • An additional alert after forty-five days from the second alert, known as the third alert, which is the last to inform you of the complete expiration of the charge.

privacyDetails.accessFiles: • The program requires access to device files to read and write some data, such as PDF files.
privacyDetails.accessDrive: • The program also requires access to your Google Drive account to back up your data.

accusedSettingsDetails.addNew: • Ability to add a new accused.
accusedSettingsDetails.modify: • Modify the accused’s data as needed.
accusedSettingsDetails.delete: • Delete the accused from the system.

searchFilterSortDetails.search: • You can easily search for a specific accused.
searchFilterSortDetails.sort: • Ability to sort data by case number.

sharingDetails: You can share the accused’s data with anyone else in PDF format.
protectionDetails: The program provides strong protection when entering through your fingerprint or iris scanner, ensuring your data’s security against tampering.
notificationManagementDetails: You can control the timing of notifications, such as stopping the first, second, or third notification as needed.
notFoundAccusedDescription:
You can go to the Add Defendants page
 and add an accused.
enterPhoneNumberAccusedAgent: Enter Phone Number of Accused's Agent
pleaseEnterPhoneNumberAccusedAgent: Please Enter Phone number of the accused's agent.
doYouWantTerminateCharge: Do you want to terminate the charge?
doYouWantReActiveCharge: Do you want to reactivate the charge?
doYouWantDeleteAccused: Do you want to delete the accused?
classifiedByNumber: The case is classified by number.
notFoundResultsForThisSearch: Not found results for this search!
notFoundResultsForThisSearchDescription: There may not be any data matching the filter you applied. You can try filtering in another way.
notFoundAccusedByThisName: There is no accused with that name.
neverSearchedAccusedBefore: Never searched for an accused before!
neverSearchedAccusedBeforeDescription: You can start searching for an accused from the field above
doYouWantUploadNewBackupToGoogleDrive: Do you want to create a new backup?
deleteBackup: This copy will be deleted from Google Drive.
deleteBackupDescription: This copy will be deleted from Google Drive and you will not be able to recover it again.
chooseHowToInstallTheCopy: Choose how to install the copy.
mergeDescription: The method of merging is to add data that does not exist in the current copy, and when identical data is obtained, it will not replace it and it will remain as it is.
replaceDescription: The replacement method means adding all the existing data in the new copy. If there is a culprit in the installed version and the new version, the old culprit will be replaced with the new one.
placeholderFilterSearch: The name of the accused, or his case number.
noBiometricActivatedDescription: Please go to Settings and activate one of the following methods: Iris, Fingerprint, Face.
pleaseAuthenticateOpenApplication: Please authenticate to open the application.
weAreSendLinkToYourEmail: We have sent the link to your email.
nameLengthMinError: Name must be at least 10 characters.
nameLengthMaxError: Name should not be more than 80 characters.
accusedLengthMinError: Accused must be at least 3 characters.
accusedLengthMaxError: Accused should not be more than 20 characters.
issueNumberLengthMinError: Issue Number must be at least 3 characters or numbers.
issueNumberLengthMaxError: Issue Number should not be more than 20 characters.
emptyNotificationsDescription: As soon as new notifications are available, they will be displayed here.
provideUsInformationProblems: Please provide us with information about the problems you encounter.
enableTrialModeDescription:
Fake data will be added so you can
 experience the app's features
 and get to know its services.
notPossibleCreateBackupOfTrialData: It is not possible to create a backup of the trial data.
chooseAuthMethodReferDescription:
When enabled,you'll need to use fingerprint ,face or other 
unique identifiers to open the application
